readable.title: 2149982207_5345633bbf
readable.content: A boy wearing a black and blue life vest is on a green , wooden boat looking out towards the water . A boy wearing a blue life jacket is holding onto the side of a green boat . A child holds on to the side of a small , weathered , green watercraft on the open sea . A little boy in a life vest is looking out the side of a boat . A young boy riding in a green boat .
